Html:
Hello,

This is pretty cool library. I am planning to use this in our application to allow users to browse wireless networks, and allow them to connect to a secured wireless network (WEP, WPA or WPA2).

The question I have is, how do I convert the user entered passphrase to a 64 hex digits in case of WPA?

Are there any built-in .Net types/methods available to achieve this?

Any help/suggestions grealy appreciated

Thanks
